description: ISTQB-certified QA Automation & Manual Test Engineer with over 10 years of experience. Skilled in JavaScript, Node.js and C#. Proficient in Specflow, Nightwatch.js, Postman, dev tools and mobile testing tools.
detailOrQuote: I excel at building strong relationships with stakeholders and delivering successful outcomes on projects. Eager to join a team valuing collaboration and innovation to create impactful solutions.
